jcr:content.jcr:title: G230 - Predator
jcr:content.searchTitle: Logitech G230 Stereo Gaming Headset with Noise-Cancelling Mic
jcr:content.seoDescription: Logitech G230 stereo gaming headset with sports performance ear cups and noise-cancelling mic is the perfect balance of comfort and performance.
jcr:content.seoPageTitle: Logitech G230 Stereo Gaming Headset with Noise-Cancelling Mic

media_tile.text: With 40 mm neodymium drivers, G230 delivers crisp, clear stereo sound that makes your game come alive.

media_tile_654806920.text: Marathon gaming sessions mean heat and sweat. We covered the G230 ear cups with carefully selected sports performance cloth for a comfortable, soft touch even after hours of use. And they slip off easily for washing to keep the headset in top shape.

media_tile_777233576.text: Earpieces have been designed to be slim and light, without skimping on audio quality. A lighter, balanced assembly means you stay focused on the game. You might even forget youâ€™re wearing a headset.

media_tile_842265300.text: Be heard loud and clear without the distraction of background noise. Adjust the mic to pick up only your voice so your teammates can hear you loud and clear.

media_tile_1548322686.text: Keep the mute switch and volume dial close at hand for quick, precise audio adjustments. All attached to an extra long, 3.2-meter cable.

media_tile_154832268.text: The ear cup pivots for a personalized fit, and rotates 90 degrees to lay flat. The lay-flat design makes them easier to transport and more comfortable when resting around the neck.

_x0031_.text: 3.5 mm headset and microphone output ports
